thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 11 of 1754
thread.title: Jack Mocarski

author: Jack Mocarski
title: Jack Mocarski
text:
Member of the family passed away and they still charge me $150 per ticket on the top of $250 cancellation fee also per ticket. Compassionate Guys?!?!?!
Within 2 hours from my posting I have received a phone call from FlightHub informing me that the $150 per ticket fee will be refunded. Remaining $250 per ticket is what FinnAir is charging so they cannot help me with that.
Thank you.
